mapper.select: select ut.series, ut.username, ut.token, ut.create_time, ut.last_used_time, ut.valid from user_token ut where ut.valid and ut.series = #{series}
mapper.insert: insert into user_token(series, username, token, create_time, last_used_time, valid) values (#{token.series}, #{token.username}, #{token.token}, #{token.createTime}, #{token.lastUsedTime}, #{token.valid})
